txt.en: While fighting in the Dunbog, you came across this mud-covered object. It seems like a child's toy... perhaps someone in Lhan Rhos will want it back.\n\nYou should return to the village and find the owner of the toy.
'Who are you? Wait, you have found my toy! Thank you, thank you. May I have it please?\n\n'I did not think I would ever find it. Did nasty beetles take it? They always steal our things. I hate them!'
While fighting in the Dunbog, you came across a mud-covered object. It seems like a child's toy.
Find the owner of the toy in Lhan Rhos
Lhan Rhos is at the centre of the Dunbog.\n\nYou should return the toy to its owner.
